5ft 7in tall Tina, went to answer the door. Before answering, she brushed aside some strands of her medium length brunette hair. At the door were five girls, three brunettes and two blonds, who immediately spoke up, "We're selling some delicious girl scout cookies." Tina was wondering, "how old are you girls, you look a little old to be girl scouts?" One of the girls, a blond, short, and kinda of chubby girl spoke up for the rest, "Oh we're all sixteen, it is our last year. We heard you won a lot of money, and we are raising money for a very import cause." Tina tried to smile and go with the situation, the attitude of the girl was getting on her nerves, "And what might that cause be." The plump blond stopped any of the other girls from saying by immediately piping up, "Oh it is a extremely important cause to use money to form a group to stop the horrible law that makes it legal for the people with the shrinking power to shrink and eat other people when ever they want. It is a despicable law, and we five girls that don't have the shrinking power are trying to stop it so that we don't have to live our lives in fear of being eaten."
         Tina laughed to herself in her head; she faked concern for the girl's cause, "Oh, you girls come in and wait, while I go get my checkbook." She waved the girls in and closed the door. The girls didn't even know what was going on before it was too late. Tina shrunk the annoying girls down to three inches. Tina went about the kitchen humming happily. She was making chocolate chip cookie batter. After she finished she brought the batter over to the bowl that held the girls, she dipped her finger in the batter and tasted it, "Mmm, just enough batter." The plump blond spoke again for the other girls, "Just enough batter for what?" Tina giggle, "Why it's just enough batter to make five nice sized chocolate chip girl scout cookies." The other girls behind the blond, started to scream and cry, while the blond shouted, "You can't do this, I thought supported our cause." Tina laughed, "Stupid girl, why would a shrink such as myself, support a cause that made it illegal to eat my favorite food."
         Tina proceeded to take the girls out one by one and get a good bit of batter and cover them up to their necks in it. She placed the cookie battered girls on a baking sheet. One of the brunettes spoke up, yelling at the plump blond, "I warned you not to mention what cause we were raising money for. I wanted to sell cookies, not become one." Tina patted the brunette on the head with her finger and giggled, "And what delicious cookies you will be." After saying that, she opened the preheated oven and slid the baking tray in. She listen for a moment to the sounds of the girls yelling about how horribly hot it was to be baked. Tina left and went into the living room and gathered up the girls' clothes and put them in a large bag to take to a Goodwill store to donate. She threw out the boxes of cookies that the girls' had had with them. Why keep them when she had real girl scout cookies in the oven.
         An hour had passed and the cookies were now cooling on the counter; they smelled spectacular. Some of the girls had frightened expressions on their faces, while two of the other had looks of peace and acceptance. Tina put all the cookies on a large plate and went into the living room to watch the evening news. She sat the plate on her lap and began by munching on the cookie that contained the annoying blond. The girl had been annoying but she made a deliciously sweet cookie. The cookies were so tasty, that soon Tina had gobbled up every one of them. For the rest of the night she listen to her belly gurgled, it sounded happy to be filled with yummy girl cookies. Tina was too happy that she ate every one in one sitting. The were good, but they were probably going to go right to her hips. Tina went to bed dreaming of more great times she might have in this new house and town.

Tina opened the door and at it was a teen boy who looked to be at least sixteen. "What do you need," She asked him. "I'm Rick, I live in the house next to you. info.brief_description: Shrinkers eat the shrunken. Shrunken people must escape to get help, or become food.
info.description:
This takes place in the same world as my other interactive, "The Shrinker Or The Shrunken."
This is a world where about about forty percent of the population now has a special power. This is the power of being able to shrink other people. Since, there are so many people now that have the power, the thing that most "Shrinkers" us their power for, has become mainstream, accepted, and legal. The thing is to shrink and devour other people. People decided it was a good way to combat overpopulation of the planet.....and world hunger. This power appears in people when they turn fifteen, so the minimum age of people that can be shrunk and eaten is fifteen. It is a common occurrence in high schools, for about one fourth of the freshman class to disappear. Where they disappear to is usually the bellies of upper class men and women. It is illegal for males to eat males, but females eating females is okay.

Rules:
1.) NO Gay stuff. So no guys eating guys;;; girls eating girls is just fine, since it is hot.
2.)No animals. No furries, scalies, or whatever else you are called. No, fish, insects, reptiles, etc. Basically no living creatures other than humans.
3.)The minimum age for characters is 15 years old, the maximum age is 36. When the main character is a guy, there are to be no other guys in that branch of the interactive. If the main character is a girl, there can be only one guy at a time, so if you want to add a second guy, kill the first one off or have him move away or whatever, just, no having two guys in the same scene.
4.)The shrinking power has a minimum and a maximum, no smaller than one inch and no bigger than twenty inches.
5.)Editions are to be written in the third person perspective; example, "Jill went to find help. Or. He swallowed her."
6.)Editions must be at least six sentences long, (i.e. A paragraph). Be descriptive. Description is what gives a story substance. Use adjectives and adverbs, they make a story more in-depth and interesting, like you were actually there experiencing it.
7.)Spell and grammatical check editions before adding them, I will not tolerate misspellings and grammatical errors.

Follow the rules perfectly and I won't delete. Have fun.
